name: TELOS
description:
MOVE FAST, JUMP HIGH, KILL FIRST.

TELOS is a multiplayer Arena Shooter with an innovative movement system.

  • MOMENTUM - Slide and walljump to gain momentum. The faster you are, the harder you are to hit.
  • KILL TO HEAL - No health pickups, no regenarating health - keep on killing to stay alive.
  • MACHINES - Each MACHINE has a unique playstyle with its own ability and passive; use your grapple hook to quickly reposition mid-fight, throw your satchel to knock back enemies or throw an explosive frag grenade to finish off enemies. THIS IS CURRENTLY WIP AND NOT AVAILABLE IN v0.3.0
  • 4 weapons - M4A1s, AK47, SVT40 and SPAS12
  • 2 gamemodes - Deathmatch and Scrimmage
  • 1 map - OXIDE
  • Customizable match settings - (match duration, kills to win, heal per kill...)
  • Up to 8 Players per lobby

TELOS is in very early development (2 months). Tell us what you think!

  • Discord server: https://discord.gg/tK4rsJS
  • Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TELOSGame
  • Trello Roadmap: https://trello.com/b/SAH4fgJn
